description: This sweet and savoury seared beef salad is delicious with green papaya, if you can get it.
name: Seared Beef & Papaya Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the beef fillets in a shallow dish and pour over the soy sauce, honey and 1 clove of garlic. Cover and marinade for 30 minutes.
Place the shredded carrot and papaya in a bowl of ice water and leave to soak for 15 minutes.
Whisk the fish sauce, lime juice, chilli, garlic and a tablespoon of chopped mint together in a small bowl.
Heat a griddle pan on high and sear the beef for 1-2 minutes each side, set aside to rest for 5 minutes then slice thinly.
Drain the papaya and carrot and toss with the dressing. Serve with sliced beef fillet, chopped mint and chopped peanuts on top.
